resources.string: Enter Registered Email and Phone to reset Password
The fod is delivered hot and fresh via our personnel right at your doorstep
There are many payment options to chose from. Pick any of Paypal, UPI, Debit/Credit Cards or net banking
How long does it until I get my food
It depends on the amount, complexity and the number of dishes you ordered and also on how far is the delivery location.But for most customers it is around 40 minutes
Will I get my entire order in single delivery?
This depends on the items you have ordered. We have partnered with different suppliers for different products to help you get the best pricing.
. Yes. There are no delivery or handling charges.
You will have to pay at the time of delivery as per the payment details we send to you via email
Your Order has been placed successfully!
